2025-08-28JUSJudges ActOrder Approving a Leave of Absence ** Hon. Heather J. Williams **Order approving a leave of absence being granted to the Honourable Heather J. Williams, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario, from her judicial duties from March 16, 2025 until September 15, 2025.N/A
subject: Order Approving a Leave of Absence ** Hon. Heather J. Williams **
precis: Order approving a leave of absence being granted to the Honourable Heather J. Williams, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice of Ontario, from her judicial duties from March 16, 2025 until September 15, 2025.
